src:
Serba-serbi Koreo 3D Super Keren ala Suporter Indonesia
07 Nov 2019, 11:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Suporter Indonesia dikenal punya banyak kreasi. Kreasi itu mereka tunjukkan saat mendukung klub kesayangan di lapangan.
Tentunya banyak cara positif untuk mendukung serta mencintai klub kebanggaan. Satu di antaranya ialah memberikan semangat kepada pemain saat bertanding di lapangan.
Kecintaan terhadap tim kesayangan tersebut bisa ditunjukkan lewat aksi kreatif yang dilakukan di dalam maupun luar stadion. Aksi yang kerap dilakukan suporter saat berada di stadion ialah dengan bernyanyi sepanjang laga dan menyajikan koreografi.
Saat ini, koreografi kerap menjadi ajang kreativitas antarsuporter di dunia, tak terkecuali Indonesia. Beberapa klub Indonesia sering menunjukkan aksi kreatif untuk mendukung klubnya serta meneror lawan.
Jenis-jenis koreo yang kerap ditunjukkan para suporter ialah 2D, 3D, 4D, hingga 2 in 1. Jika bicara koreo, suporter PSS Sleman, Brigata Curva Sud (BCS) menjadi satu di antara terbaik di Indonesia.
Kelompok suporter yang dikenal mendukung PSS di tribune selatan Stadion Maguwoharjo itu dikenal cukup loyal dan fanatik saat mendukung tim kebanggaannya tersebut.
Mungkin suguhan koreo yang ditunjukkan BCS sudah tak terhitung. Selain itu, aksi yang disajikan sangat keren.
Selain Brigata Curva Sud, banyak suporter lain di Indonesia yang kerap menunjukkan aksi koreografi. Dilansir Bola.com, berikut kumpulan koreo 3D super keren karya suporter Indonesia.
text:
Super Cool 3D Korean style Sundanese Indonesian Supporters
Nov 7 2019, 11:15 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Indonesian supporters are known to have many creations. They show their creations when supporting their favorite club on the field.
Of course there are many positive ways to support and love a club of pride. One of them is to encourage the players when playing on the field.
The love of the beloved team can be shown through creative actions carried out inside and outside the stadium. The action that is often done by supporters when in the stadium is to sing throughout the game and present the choreography.
Today, choreography is often an arena of creativity among supporters in the world, including Indonesia. Some Indonesian clubs often show creative actions to support their clubs and terrorize opponents.
The types of choreo that are often shown by supporters are 2D, 3D, 4D, up to 2 in 1. When it comes to choreo, Sleman PSS supporters, Brigata Curva Sud (BCS) become one of the best in Indonesia.
The group of supporters who are known to support PSS in the southern tribune of the Maguwoharjo Stadium are known to be quite loyal and fanatical when supporting their pride team.
Maybe the choreo shows that BCS has shown are countless. In addition, the action presented is very cool.
In addition to Brigata Curva Sud, many other supporters in Indonesia often show choreography. Reported by Bola.com, here is a collection of super cool 3D choreos by Indonesian supporters.
